attributes.action: use every penny that is sent in aid and subsidies to other countries to build houses for people in this country who cannot afford over inflated house prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: spend every penny for two years that is being sent abroad in aid and subsidies and build houses and the housing crisis will be over and remove poverty in the U.K in one hit, people will be even more generous in future if they arent striken by poverty, who cares about other countries poverty stricken when you are in the same boat?.
